Create a virtual sock game where users can design their own socks and compete with others in a fashion show.
Develop a smart sock that tracks foot movement and provides feedback to help people improve their posture and gait.
Create a sock-making app that allows users to customize their own socks using various designs, colors, and materials.
Develop a sock that can generate electricity from the movement of the feet to power small devices.
Create a sock that has built-in sensors to monitor the temperature and moisture levels of the feet to help prevent blisters and foot infections.
